attributes.action: Give Simon Dolan, KBF Founder a knighthood and peerage.
attributes.additional_details: People are suffering from mental health, cancer referrals missed since the start of the government imposed lockdowns. Simon Dolan has given up his own time to help keep Britain free and restore the freedoms of millions of British people in the UK.
attributes.background: Acknowledge the tireless efforts of Simon Dolan, which has helped promote freedom in the UK with a peerage - for the duration of the life of the House of Lords - and a knighthood.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments.

You can nominate someone for an honour or award at:
https://www.gov.uk/honours
